title: NoMethodError: undefined method `[]' for nil:NilClass - retry_jobs.rb:99 attempt_retry
body:
While this is my fault (custom Exception class and having forgotten about `message` method), Sidekiq should be extremely cautious. Any exception in `attempt_retry` shouldn't prevent the job from being scheduled again. I guess. :-)

Sidekiq 3.4.2.

```

[sidekiq] 2015-12-10T19:39:40.349Z 25586 TID-19yc7c WARN: NoMethodError: undefined method `[]' for nil:NilClass
```
